title: [Extension Proposal] Antora

labels.name: area/quarkiverse
labels.description: This issue/PR is part of the Quarkiverse organization

body:
### Description

Most Quarkus extension projects use Antora for their docs. The idea is to have an extension that would be able to rebuild the AsciiDoc sources and show the preview in dev mode. I have a PoC ready.

Interested in this extension, please +1 via the emoji/reaction feature of GitHub (top right).

### Repository name

quarkus-antora

### Short description

Build and serve Antora documentation site

### Repository Homepage URL

https://quarkiverse.github.io/quarkiverse-docs/<REPOSITORY_NAME>/dev/
